infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Alertivo needs your location to find nearby responders and ensure accurate emergency response.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Alertivo requires access to your location even in the background to keep responders updated during emergencies.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Alertivo needs continuous location access to provide real-time safety and quick emergency response.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Alertivo needs microphone access to let you speak with clinic staff during emergencies.
